name: Indufor Oy
goal:
Indufor is one of the world's leading forest and natural resources consulting service providers.
Indufor has completed some 900 projects and has more than 300 clients all over the world.
The company is fully owned by its management and staff members.
The overall purpose of the company is to consult public and private natural resources companies, associations and organizations in natural resources management, funding and investment advisory and strategic industrial development projects.
Indufor has high-quality in-depth knowledge across natural resources, sustainability, climate change and bio solutions industry value chains.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: forest industry, sustainable finance, natural resources, sustainability, climate change, bio solutions
